settings.heading: About ERGOGAIN
settings.body: We believe that great design should enhance both performance and well-being. Founded with a mission to transform workspaces through ergonomic excellence, we create products that adapt to you, not the other way around.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: To create ergonomic solutions that empower professionals to work comfortably and efficiently, reducing strain while maximizing productivity.

settings.title: Our Vision
settings.text: A world where every workspace is optimized for human comfort and performance, where technology serves to enhance rather than hinder our natural capabilities.

settings.title: Our Values
settings.text: Innovation through research, uncompromising quality, sustainable practices, and a relentless focus on user experience drive everything we do.
